title: New Opposition Leader Asks U.S. To Establish Safe Zones In Syria
teaser: New Syrian opposition coalition leader Khaled Khoja visits Washington, D.C., to urge the U.S. to set up safe zones in the country and stop Bashar al-Assad's air campaign against rebel-held areas.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
